recipesJson.name: Idioteque (Lemon Cheesecake)
recipesJson.author: McFly
recipesJson.description: Super rich, creamy cheesecake with just the right amount of lemon. Minimum of 1 week steep or the anise in Nonna's cake will be way too strong. Mellows out after that; boosts the lemon and overall thick creaminess of the vape.

reviews.text: I wanted to make a lemon cheesecake, and then I seen this. The mix of nonnas cake and jf juicy lemon was a great choice and the meringue too. Great job!
This is so good! JF Juicy Lemon is awesome. I really can't get enough of this. Just whipped up another 120ml. Great job!
